Meg Otanwa (amuru Febụwarị 14) bụ onye omere Naijiria na onye bụbu onye ọrụ ụlọ akụ
O kwuru na asụsụ na-amasi ya ma na-asụ asụsụ ise nke ọma
O mere Nollywood mpụta mbụ ya n'afọ 2011 na ihe nkiri a, I will take my chances wee gosi na fim dịka October 1 (2018), Ojuju (2014), Kpians: The Feast of Souls (2014) na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ
Ọ bụ Nọvemba 2006 onye a ma ama mkpuchiri akwụkwọ Zen Magazine
Otanwa sitere na mpaghara na-asụ asụsụ Idoma nke Benue State, Nigeria,  ọ toro   na Lagos na ebe ndị ozo
O sitere na ezinụlọ polyglot ma na-asụ ihe dị ka asụsụ ise gụnyere Bekee, Yoruba, French, Hausa, asụsụ ala nna ya bụ Idoma na ụfọdụ Spanish

Ọ bụ onye gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Ahmadu Bello, Zaria  ebe ọ nwetara akara ugo mmụta bachelor na asụsụ bekee, wee nweta akara ugo mmụta masta na Human Resources Management na TIME University, Tunis, Tunisia na emesia, maka Master of Business Administration
nzere na Mahadum Jean Moulin, Lyon, France

N'ịbụ onye na-arụ ọrụ ruo ogologo oge na African Development Bank, Tunis, Tunisia, Otanwa gbara arụkwaghịm wee malite ọrụ ime ihe nkiri, na-eme ya Nollywood mpụta mbụ na 2011,  egosi ya na ihe nkiri egba egwu nke Emem Isong, I'll Take my Chance
N'afọ 2014, ọ gbara n'ime ihe nkiri Kunle Afolayan, October 1 ; n'usoro ihe nkiri Bodunrin Sasore, Before 30, nke na-egosi "Aisha"; na ihe nkiri Charles Novia, Atlanta
Egosiputara ya na telenovela 2016 Africa Magic 's mpụta mbụ, Nollywood's Hush, dị ka "Koko Ogunbiade"
Ndị ọzọ egosikwara  bụ Richard Mofe-Damijo, Thelma Okoduwa na Rotimi Adelegan

A họpụtara ya na 2017 Africa Magic Viewers Choice Awards maka onye na- eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na ụdị ihe nkiri na ihe nrite AMVCA maka usoro izizi MNET, nke ọ meriri, maka ọrụ ya na telenovela thriller, Hush
Onye na-eme ihe nkiri nọkwa na kapeeti uhie nke mmemme 2018
N'ime ihe nkiri 2018 nke Tosin Igho akpọrọ, The Eve, a gosiri ya dịka "Yewande", na-eso ụmụ nwanyị na nwoke na-eme ihe nkiri dịka Beverly Naya, Hauwa Allhabura, John Okafor na ndị ọzọ
N'ime ihe nkiri 2020, For Maria Ebun Pataki, nke Damilola Orimogunje duziri, emere ya dika "Derin"
E gosipụtara ya dị ka "Angela" na Dimeji Ajibola's sci-fi thriller, Ratnik, ewepụtara ya Disemba 1, 2020 gosikwara Osas Ighodaro, Karibi Fubara, Paul Utomi na ndị ọzọ
